text:
Created attachment 15953
More information about StyleTextPropAtom

Nick, The attached file contains details on how text properties are stored in
StyleTextPropAtom. Review it and later we can put all pieces of information
together.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru

text:
The StyleTextPropAtom stuff looks very handy, thanks for that.

Armed with that, I might be able to make sense of the GOffice code for
StyleTextPropAtom, and thus be able to implement it fully :) I'll commit it once
I've finished the StyleTextPropAtom updates, so we can get it as complete as we can.


I'll give the Font stuff a quick review later and commit, looks good from a scan
though.
creator: apache@gagravarr.org

text: Thanks for that info. I've added the details to the documentation and committed.
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
